column5: He thought it was a steelhead. I'm not sure, salmon maybe? So I thought I would post it to some of the experts, nice fish anyways.  http://i1198.photobucket.com/albums/aa446/mtorcoletti/Fishing/IMG_8282.jpg
I'd say Chinook Salmon...the black around the mouth is the giveaway.  Steelhead mouths are white.  Nice fish regardless!!!!
Thanks Guys, It looked like Chinook to me as well with the black mouth but then I started to second guess myself.
